post.author: 최덕선
post.content:
안녕하세요.
다음은 잘 아는 agency로 부터 받은 3개월 짜리 contract 자리대한 메일의 일부분 입니다. 관심있으신 분은 저에게 직접 연락을 주시든지 아니면 직접 연락하시기 바랍니다.(Travis를 통해 알았다고 하고 가까운 친구라 그러면 됩니다.)
행운이 있으시길...
1. ***** 2200 Yonge Street Toronto
Posn to Fill: Developer/Java, Cold Fusion/Visual Age/ORACLE
Contract Range: open Technology/Applications: Oracle, Java, Cold Fusion, Visual Age
- 3 month contract - candidate must be available immediately project - sales force automation project
Cam Martin Resource Manager Asset Computer Personnel 48 Yonge Street, Suite 500 Toronto, Ontario M5E 1G6 (416) 777-1717x318 cmartin@asset.ca
=============================================================================== 2.
다음은 제가 알 지 못하는 agency로 부터 받은 또다른 3개월짜리 contract 자리입니다. 관심있으신 분에게 행운이 있으시길 빕니다.
Hello, My name is Natasha Ovsienco and I am a Resource Manager with Ajilon-Canada. We are looking for Senior IT professional with Visualage, Java, EJB, Websphere experience for 3 months (January 7, 2002 - March 31, 2002) contract opportunity in Winnipeg. If you or anyone you know might be interested please call or email me ASAP I look forward to hearing from you.
Best regards, Natasha Ovsienco Resource Manager Ajilon - CTC Computer-Tech Consultants Ltd. (403) 233-7233 ext. 222 (403) 538-3198 (direct line) Toll free: 1-888-595-4164 Email: novsienco@ctctech.com
post.title: Looking for Job ?
